changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.log_modified_service_status_code_sequencing() RETURNS trigger AS 'com.hellblazer.CoRE.event.animation.JobAnimations.log_modified_service_status_code_sequencing' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.log_modified_service_status_code_sequencing() OWNER TO core;
